spells.html_content:
Spells

Attraction
/ Perfusion
2 - 3 Range / 3AP

Attracts the target.
If the target is an ally, also applies the Perfusion state. Does not affect the caster.

The spell's maximum range increases with the caster's Suffering:
• Suffering 1 to 2: +1 Range
• Suffering 3 to 4: +2 Range
• Suffering 5 to 6: +3 Range
• Suffering 7 to 8: +4 Range
• Suffering 9 to 10: +5 Range
Required level: :
1|68|134

'Perfusion' state (2 turns)

spells.html_content:
Spells

Mutilation
/ Punishment
0 Range / 2AP

Sacrifices some of the caster's health to increase their Power.
At the start of each turn, sacrifices some of their health again to increment their Mutilation state as long as the spell is active.

Casting the spell again removes the applied effects and casts the Coagulation spell:
• Applies a shield on the caster.
• The shield is greater based on the Mutilation state.
Required level: :
10|77|144

Normal effects

-10% HP (infinite)
50 Power (infinite)
'Mutilation I' state (infinite)
'Mutilation II' state (infinite)
'Mutilation III' state (infinite)
Coagulation
200% of level to shield (2 turns)
400% of level to shield (2 turns)
600% of level to shield (2 turns)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Thorn Crown
/ Pillory
0 Range / 2AP

Applies the Thorn Crown state on the caster:
• Reflects 100% of final damage suffered in close combat back at enemy attackers.

If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, applies the Martyr's Thorn Crown state on the caster:
• Reflects 100% of final damage suffered in close combat back at enemies in a 2-cell circle around the caster.

Also applies a shield on the caster for each adjacent enemy.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
45|112|179

Normal effects

'Thorn Crown' state (1 turn)
'Martyr's Thorn Crown' state (1 turn)

5% of HP to shield (1 turn)

5

Line of sight
No

No

Yes

Cross of 1 cell

spells.html_content:
Spells

Fluctuation
/ Transposition
0 Range / 2AP

Makes the caster Unlockable and increases their MP.
If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, also makes the caster's Swords Unlockable and gives them 2 MP for 1 turn.

The MP bonus on the caster is greater based on the caster's Suffering:
- Suffering 1: 1 MP
- Suffering 2 to 4: 2 MP
- Suffering 5 to 7: 3 MP
- Suffering 8 to 10: 4 MP

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
140

spells.html_content:
Spells

Pillory
/ Thorn Crown
4 Range / 2AP

Increases the target's ranged resistances and applies the Unmovable and Pillory states on it:
• Removes the spell's effects if the target suffers close-combat damage, and heals the caster.

If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, applies the Martyr's Pillory state on the target:
• The effects can no longer be removed.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
155

Riposte
/ Transfusion
1 - 5 Range / 2AP

Moves the caster closer to the target.

For 1 turn, moves the caster closer to the targeted enemy if the caster suffers enemy damage.

The spell's range increases with the caster's Suffering:
• Suffering 2 to 4: +1 Range
• Suffering 5 to 7: +2 Range
• Suffering 8 to 10: +3 Range

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Penitence
/ Sacrifice
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Switches places with the targeted ally and applies the Penitence state on the target:
• If it is an ally: switches places with the caster upon taking damage.
• If it is an enemy: switches places with the caster upon inflicting damage on the caster.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
